content.question: One interpretation of Andy Warhol’s Marilyn Diptych asserts that the artist intended to elevate the status of his subject to that of a religious icon by the use of a diptych format; another interpretation argues that the artist no longer viewed painting as a fine art distinct from popular culture because of the work’s

choices.label: abrupt variations of color found throughout the composition
multiple references to mechanical forms of reproduction
heightened contrast and realistic detailing in each portrait
combination of diverse painting styles or techniques

content.answer: multiple references to mechanical forms of reproduction

topic.text: 4.4: Theories and Interpretations of Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
